text: Slavoj Žižek (born 21 March 1949) is a Slovenian philosopher. He has written more than 70 books. He wrote his first English book The Sublime Object of Ideology in 1989. Žižek writes about a lot of different things. Things that Žižek writes about include psychoanalysis, politics, pop culture, and theology from a Marxist point of view. He writes for The Guardian. In 2013, he married the Slovene journalist Jela Krečič. ==Documentaries== In 2006 Žižek presented a documentary that he had written called The Pervert's Guide to Cinema. In the documentary Žižek used psychoanalytical film theory on several movies. In 2007 a documentary about Žižek called Žižek! was released. In 2012 The Pervert's Guide to Ideology was released in the United Kingdom. It was written and presented by Žižek. The documentary is a sequel to The Pervert's Guide to Cinema. ==References== Category:20th-century philosophers Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian academics
